recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (cooked): 2 cups - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - red onion (finely chopped): 1/4 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - kalamata olives (pitted and halved): 1/4 cup - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 1 clove - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/8 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare the Vegetables: Dice the cucumber, halve the cherry tomatoes, finely chop the red onion, and mince the garlic. 2. Mix Salad Ingredients: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, and kalamata olives. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. 4. Combine and Chill: Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients and mix well. Refrigerate for at least 20 minutes to allow the flavors to blend. 5. Serve: Adjust the seasoning if necessary, and serve chilled.
